sentences.sentence: And this time it was the West the colonialists themselves!
sentences.translation: 这次是西方(殖民者自己！)

sentences.sentence: The colonialists brought untold sufferings to African peoples.
sentences.translation: 殖民者给非洲人民带来了数不清的痛苦。

sentences.sentence: "The Chinese used to be more populist," the spokesman added, "but now they are turning into colonialists themselves."
sentences.translation: “中国人曾经受欢迎，”这位发言人补充道，“但是现在，他们自己正在变成殖民者。”
